GIVE **Californians won’t forget that Adam Gray voted to allow illegals to decide U.S. elections** Theoverwhelming majority of Americansagree that only American citizens should decide American elections, yet out of touch Democrat Adam Gray voted to allow illegal immigrants to decide our elections. Then under mounting pressure, Gray flip-flopped but the damage was done and Gray proved he will prioritize the radical far-left agenda ahead of Californians. Gray’s flip-flop followed two separatelawsuitsby Democrats against President Trump’s executive order requiring voters to prove they’re U.S. citizens before registering to vote in federal elections. “Adam Gray’s vote to let illegal immigrants decide our elections was a slap in the face to every American citizen.
